boardrelated

Interface Auctionable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    buyableSquare, cabSquare, deedSquare, RailroadTrackSquare, Stock, utilitySquare

    public interface Auctionable
    Auctionable interface is provided to allow the use of auctions in subclasses which have different attributes in auctions. Its instances provide the procedures that are to be applied upon a game and players.
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Cem Uyuk

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processAuction(Game g, Player p)
      Follows the appropriate procedure of an auction.

    • Method Detail

      • processAuction

        void processAuction(Game g,
                    Player p)
        Follows the appropriate procedure of an auction.
        Parameters:
        g - Phe game that auctionable instance is in.
        p - The player who is taking turn in auction.
